events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and it is currently under review by our hiring team.
After reviewing your resume, we have categorised your application under the software engineering department based on your experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the recruitment process moving forward.
The initial screening call was completed successfully, where we discussed your background and assessed your alignment with the software developer role.
Candidate responded promptly to our request for availability for the next step in the interview process. Very engaged and enthusiastic.
We have scheduled the technical interview with the lead software engineer for next week, focusing on coding skills and system design.
The technical interview went very well. The candidate demonstrated strong problem-solving abilities and deep knowledge of software development.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture fit, benefits, and other logistical topics with the candidate.
The HR interview was positive; the candidate showed great enthusiasm for the role and alignment with our company values.
An offer has been formally proposed to the candidate including details about salary, benefits, and joining date.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed strong interest in joining our engineering team.
The candidate has formally accepted the offer and is looking forward to starting their new role as a software engineer.
Onboarding activities have started, including account setup, introduction to the team, and initial training sessions.
The hiring process is now complete. The candidate has successfully joined our software development team and is fully onboarded.
